1b1(mdo sde):
1b2(mdo sde): nga smra la/ 
1b3(mdo sde):
2a1(mdo sde): 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
2b1(mdo sde): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po drang thabs// 
2b2(mdo sde): gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
2b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen khe rdo rje sgra dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
2b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po mi 'jam pa dang / ngag mchog dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / ji
2b5(mdo sde): med snying po dang / ye shes rgyal po dang / mtha' yas sde dang / ye shes snang ba dang // 
3a1(mdo sde): ye shes sgron ma dang / shes rab snang ba dang / tshangs pas byin dang / byang chub
3a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan dang / de dag dang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems// 
3a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po dbang che bdabang che bar grags pa sha stag dang ya thabs gcig go/ de nas
3a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshed nga ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi
3a5(mdo sde): zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dres pa na/ 'jig rten
3a6(mdo sde): gyi khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ nga na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
3b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan shin tu yongs bsgrags dpal zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhi// 
3b2(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'e'u bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi
3b3(mdo sde): bye ma snyed 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthong dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa
3b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangasargyas kun tu snang zhes bya ba da ltar yangabazhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
3b5(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston to//  shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log sa su 'jig rten gyi khams gang
3b6(mdo sde): ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na// 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de nas de
3b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba
4a1(mdo sde): / da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar
4a2(mdo sde): phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par
4a3(mdo sde): dog pa'i tshegs shes bya ba yod dre/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
4a4(mdo sde): dbang po'i rtog gi rgyal mtshan gyi/ rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te// ste/ 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang
4a5(mdo sde): ston to// shA ri'i bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhong 'ang nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gong gi'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 
4a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bral tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
4a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas pa snang po'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la
4b1(mdo sde): chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig/ 
4b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams slu ba med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa med par snyan pa'i
4b3(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba de ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su spangs
4b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gong ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
4b5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma la rnam par gnon pasabazhud pas zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 
4b6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang go'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed
4b7(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogaso ba'i sangs rgyas
4b8(mdo sde): rin po che'i pad+ma la rab tu gnas par dngong rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu de bzhin
5a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag ni/ yongasu dag pa ste/ bud med me'o// / 
5a2(mdo sde): snyigs ma lnga med do// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
5a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag gi mtshan thos nas/ len cing 'dzin la klog cing kun chub par byed de/ 'jug par byed cing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag
5a4(mdo sde): par rab tu ston na/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ yi dgas kyi yul lam/ lha ma
5a5(mdo sde): yin rnams kyi nang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas med de/ go skabs ma yino// mi khom pa rnams skye ba de'i gan sa medo// shA ri'i bu bud med kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs
5a6(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas/ blangs shing gzung la/ blags shing kun chub par byas te/ 'jug par byas shing / gzhan dag la
5a7(mdo sde): yang rgya cher yang dag par rig par rab tu bshwad na/ shA ri'i bu de bud med kyi dngos po lan gnyis len pa'i gnas de med cing go skabs ma yin te/ de'i gnas medado// shA ri'i bu
5a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de
5b1(mdo sde): ngag gi mtshan thos nas blangs shing bzung la/ blags shing kun chub par byas te/ 'jug par byas shing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ de la lnga
5b2(mdo sde): dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon cha las 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar
5b3(mdo sde): shes par bya'o// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
5b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan brjod de// nub mo srod la nyal na de bde bar gnyid kyi ldog pa ra 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur zhing / sdig pa can
5b5(mdo sde): gyi rmi lam rmi bar mi 'gyur te/ de gnyid kyis log pa na yang lha rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag
5b6(mdo sde): par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan brjod nas/ mtshan mo tho rangs 'jig rten
5b7(mdo sde): pa'i bya ba rnams rtsom na/ 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur gyi/ 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la
5b8(mdo sde): zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas/ len cing 'dzin la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ 'jug par byed
6a1(mdo sde): cing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ de 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi bar du nam yang mngon par shes pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam
6a2(mdo sde): yang gzungs dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang mtshan dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang shes rab shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur// 
6a3(mdo sde): nam yang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi bar du nam yang shes rab phun sum
6a4(mdo sde): tshogs pa shin tu brgyas pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas
6a5(mdo sde): gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rten mgo na po 'di dag gi/ mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed pa// de ni ngan 'gro kun bzlog nas// ring por mi thogs bde 'gro
6a6(mdo sde): 'gro rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/ de'i sems ni dang bar 'gyur// rtag tu 'jig rten mgon mthong nas// mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin
6a7(mdo sde): byed pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// de ni 'du ba'i sgo snyed cing // de ni rtag tu bkur bar 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// lha rnams
6a8(mdo sde): kyis ni rtag tu mchod// myur du byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// de ni shes rab 'chal ba 'am// blun pa 'am 'on par yong mi 'gyur// kun tu
6b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa// de la lha klu gnod sbyin dang/ gsang ba lnga dang lha min rnams// nyin dang mtshan du srung bar byed// mtshan rnams 'dir// 
6b2(mdo sde): 'dzin byed pa// de ni gzugs mtshan phun sum tshogs// 'byor pa'i rigasu skye 'gyur zhing // de ni sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur// thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pas// bskal pa bye ba brgya
6b3(mdo sde): mang du// de yi kha nas dri 'byung ba// dri bsrung zhing po 'byung bar 'gyur// thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa// rdzu 'phrul che zhing yid gzhungs la// 'dab ma bye ba stong ldan pa'i// rin chen
6b4(mdo sde): pad+mar skye bar 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed dpa// pha dang ma dang rtsa lag dang // spun rnams kyi ni yid 'ong zhing // nam yang 'phongs pa mthong mi 'gyur// bud
6b5(mdo sde): med kyis kyang blo ldan pa// de dag rnams kyi mtshan thos na// bud med lus la yid byung nas// mkhas shing skye sa par skye bar 'gyur// lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir// 
6b6(mdo sde): myur du byang chub 'tshang rgya ste// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi// rten dang skyabasu 'byung bar 'gyur// de la mtshon gyis mi tshugs te// dug gis mi tshugs mes ma yin// g.yon can
6b7(mdo sde): dngag dang chom rkun dang / rgyal po 'am de la gnod mi byed// thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa// de la sdig dang ldan pa'i bdud// nag po'i rtsa lag bzhin bcas pas// glags ni rnyed
6b8(mdo sde): bar yong mi 'gyur// zhing rnams bye ba bsam yas su// de ni mtha' las 'gro 'gyur te// phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing der ni// 'jig rten mgon po rnams la lta// brtan pa sangs rgyas nas
7a1(mdo sde): mthong nas// dad pa brtan po thob par 'gyur// de yi bsam pa mkhyen nas su// mi mchog rnams ni lung ston to// thub pa rnams las mngon sum bdag/ byang chub lung
7a2(mdo sde): bstan thos nas su// rtag tu dga' dang ldan 'gyur zhing // de ni dogs pa med par 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig mtshan 'di dag/ thos nas rab tu 'dzin byed pa// de ni yon tan
7a3(mdo sde): 'di dag dang // rgya chen gzhan yang los kyang 'thob// thub pa drang srong che gyur pa// 'di dag rnams kyi mtshan thos nas// mi gang mtshan rnams 'dzin byed pa// rdzu 'phrul che
7a4(mdo sde): mkhas bsod nams 'dod// de lta bas na bdag nyid che// de dag rnams kyi mtshan thos na// skyes bu mkha das pas gzung bya zhing // gzhan dag la ni bshad par bya// 
7a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha
7a6(mdo sde): ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba
7a7(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// / @#/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya man dzu shrI bi krI Di ti nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal
7a8(mdo sde): rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
7b1(mdo sde): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems
7b2(mdo sde): dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo/ gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang
7b3(mdo sde): zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa zhig 'dug ste/ bu mo de yang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus/ lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog
7b4(mdo sde): lta bur mngon par grub par gyur cing / sa'i phyog/ das gang dag du 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 'gro ba'i sa phyogs de dag kyang / gser gyi kha dog lnga
7b5(mdo sde): bu'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/ des gos dmar po/ 'am/ gang dag gyon par gyur pa'i gos de dag tha mas cad kyang / gser gyi kha dog lta bu nyid du snang ngo // 
7b6(mdo sde): bu mo de yang skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la dga' zhing yid gcugs pa dang / blta bas mi ngoms shing / bka' blo bde la/ nges pa dang / 'jam pa dang / snyan pa dang / 
7b7(mdo sde): dga' bar smra zhing / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / shin tu 'thun par 'dzin pa dang / khro gnyer med pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi brlang bar gyur pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po
7b8(mdo sde): de na rgyal bu gzhon nu rnams dang / blon po'i bu gzhon nu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu gzhon nu rnams dang / khyim bdag gi bu gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / de la shin tu chags shing
8a1(mdo sde): yid 'brang bar gyur te/ lta bas chog mi shes so// smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de bskyes mos tshal lam/ 'bab chu 'am/ rdzing bu'o// 
8a2(mdo sde): khyim 'am/ lam che 'am/ grong bar ram/ gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de dag tu/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po rnams kyang shin tu ltad mor gyur nas/ kun
8a3(mdo sde): 'dus te de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro'o// de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs sbyin zhes bya bas/ nor gyis glas te/ bskyed mos
8a4(mdo sde): tshal gyi sar byung nas rta bzhi dang ldan pa'i shing rta dang 8/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / gser gyi ngas legs par brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
8a5(mdo sde): ba dan bsgreng zhing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / me tog 'phreng gis mdzes par byas pa/ me tog tsam pa ka'i phreng bas skar khung byas
8a6(mdo sde): ba'i nang du stan bzang po bshams pa la 'dug nas/ 'di ltar rtse zhing dga' ba'i bsam pas shing rta de'i mdun du ni/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdo ba dang / glu dbyangs len pa dag gis
8a7(mdo sde): drangs/ shing rta de'i phyi bzhin du nye bar spyad pa dang / yongasu spyad pa thogs pa thams cad rje su 'brang la/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po ltad mo lta ba'i bsam pa can dag kyang / phyi bzhin du 'dra
8a8(mdo sde): par gyur cing / skyed mos tshal gyi sar dang ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po skyes nas/ 'di
8b1(mdo sde): snyam du sems te su zhig rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lam/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul lam/ rje su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can gang / theg pa chen po
8b2(mdo sde): 'di la yongasu smin par bya snyam pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang / lhan cig tu shing rta
8b3(mdo sde): la zhon te/ bskyes mos tshal gyi sar 'gro bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'dul ba'i phyir de'i dbang po dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi bye brag la rnam par bltas nas/ de
8b4(mdo sde): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing / chos kun shes par bya ba'i nus pa dang / mthu dang skal ba yod par da rig nas/ de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
8b5(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba/ mngon pa ra 'du byas te/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byas pas/ 'di ltar rang gi lus bstan ma thag tu/ nyin
8b6(mdo sde): ma dang / zla ba'i 'od kyang zil du rlag par byed na/ sems can gzhan dag gi lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de lta bur rang gi lus rnam par sprul nas/ gos gang gi 'od kyis dpag tshad
8b7(mdo sde): gcig tsam gyi khor yug snang bas/ snang bar byed pa'i gos de lta bu yang lus la gyon par kun tu stan to// rang gi lus rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par yang bstan to// / 
8b8(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lus la gos dang / brgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan nas/ lam gang nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal/ 
9a1(mdo sde): / 'ong ba'i lam de'i mdun log su bsdad do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas der bsdang ma thag tu/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu de'i shing rta yang mog chog por gru
9a2(mdo sde): smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyi lus thams cad kyang mog mog por gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi drung du snag cha'i yug bzhag
9a3(mdo sde): nang lam mer mi 'dug/ lhan ner mi 'dug/ lhang der mi 'dug go// de bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus kyi 'od kyi 'od kyis reg pa na/ bu mo de'i lus kyang
9a4(mdo sde): lam mer mi 'dug/ lhang nger mi 'dug go// smad 'a/ tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis/ 'ja ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lha'i bu gzhon nu ltar 'dug
9a5(mdo sde): lang lus la rgyan gyis brgyan cing / gsal ba'i gos legs par gyon la/ gos de las kyang 'od 'byung bar mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de bdag gi
9a6(mdo sde): lus la brnyas pa'i 'du shes dang / dman pa'i 'du shes skyes shing / gos de la yang mngon par 'dod pa dang / gzung ba'i 'du shes smras nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 
9a7(mdo sde): tshong dpon gyi bu 'dis chog gis/ bdag shing rta 'di las babs la 'di dang lhan cig tu dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' dgur spyad la/ gos 'di yang bslang bar bya'o snyam mo// 
9a8(mdo sde): bu mo des de lta bu'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bdag nyid mi'i gzugasu mngon
9b1(mdo sde): par sprul nas/ bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod skyes bu dam pa 'di la kun tu chags pa'i sems ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni 'dod pa don du gnyer ba ma chi/ 
9b2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir ro// bu mos smras pa/ 'di su zhig yin na/ 'di'i ming ci/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya'o// bu
9b3(mdo sde): mos smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ji zhig yin/ de ci lha 'am/ 'on te klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ me 'am ci'am/ lho/ 
9b4(mdo sde): phye chen po 'am/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'ji ga rten skyong ba 'am/ rgyal po chen po 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ji zhig yin/ rnam thos kyi bus
9b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni// lha yang ma yin/ klu yang ma yin/ gnod sbyin yang / ma yin/ dri za yang ma yin/ lha ma yin yang ma yin/ nam
9b6(mdo sde): mkha' lding yang ma yin/ mi 'am ci yang ma yin/ lto 'phye chen po yang ma yin/ brgya byin yang ma yin/ tshangs pa yang ma yin/ 'jig rten bskyong ba yang ma yin/ rgyal po chen
9b7(mdo sde): po yang ma yin te/ bu mo de ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa kun yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// 'di ni spangs pa thams cad sbyin pa
9b8(mdo sde): byed de yong su mi stong pa ji yang med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de nas bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ de skad grag pa las na 'dis bdag la gos 'di sbyin par
10a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal/ shing rting las babs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
10a2(mdo sde): smras so// 'jam dpal gang khyod kyi ska la gsol ba'i na bza' 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// gal te khyod ni byang chub la yang zhug
10a3(mdo sde): gyur na// 'jam dbyangs na bza' 'di ni bdag la stsal du gsol// ser sna can gyi byang chub sems dpa' mi mdzes de// dper na chab dang bral ba'i skams pa'i klung dang mtshung// 
10a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gal te bu mo khyod ni byangachub zhugs gyur na// kho bos de ring gos 'di khyod dal sbyin par bya// gang dag g.yo ba med par byang chub sems
10a5(mdo sde): la gnas// de dag 'di na lhar bcas 'jig rten mtsho/ da 'os yin// bu mos smras pa/ byang chub ces pa gyi bo'i tshig gi don gang zhig lags// de ni gang las
10a6(mdo sde): thob cing su zhig stsol bar bgyid// tshogs rnams gang dag la ni nges par bsten bgyis na/ mkhas pa ma lags ma rtogs rnams kyis rtogs par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyis
10a7(mdo sde): smras pa/ sring mo brjod pa med pa dang / yi ge med pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag las rnam par grol ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma dag dang / bral ba dang / 
10a8(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba ni byang chub ces bya'o// de skad ces smras nas/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bu mo de la 'di skad ces
10b1(mdo sde): smras so// sring mo khyod byang chub tu sems bskyed cig dang / ngas khyod la gos 'di sbyin no// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang lags// 'jam dpal gyis
10b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ sring mo khyod nyid byang chub yin no// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ma 'tshal na/ ji ltar bdag byang chub lags// 'jam dpal
10b3(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ sring mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs pa de/ 'di skad du 'di ltar lus mnyam pa nyid
10b4(mdo sde): kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyi rad kyis lus mnyam pa nyid do zhes chos ston te/ srid mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub po
10b5(mdo sde): zhes smra so// sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi lu sa 'di la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched/ mngon par grub pa yod dam/ de nas bu mo des bstan pa
10b6(mdo sde): 'di thos nas/ de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu 'thun pas/ chos la snang ba skyes par gyur te/ des snang ba thob nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// / 
10b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de ni de lta lags te/ bdag gi lus 'di la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag mngon par grub pa ma lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo 'di
10b8(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems/ gzugs la sems pa'am/ rnam par shes pa yod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo
11a1(mdo sde): byang chub kyang mi sems shing / rnam par shes pa med de/ sring mo de'i phyir gzugs mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis
11a2(mdo sde): gzugs mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub po zhes smra so// sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
11a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sems pa'am/ rnam par shes pa yod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma mchi so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub
11a4(mdo sde): kyang mi sems shing / rnam par shes pa med de/ srid mo de'i phyir rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ bya/ ngang chub mnyam pa nyid// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis// 
11a5(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyi 8/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bozhes smra so// sring mo gzhan yang gzugs nang ngam// 
11a6(mdo sde): phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga med par ram/ gzugs 'di sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po'am/ dkar po 'am/ le brgan nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam
11a7(mdo sde): yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par nus sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub
11a8(mdo sde): kyang nang ngam phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga med par ram/ byang chub de sngon po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po'am/ leb rgan nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas pa
11b1(mdo sde): 'amang phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par mi nus te/ sring mo de'i phyir/ gzugs mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs mnyam pa nyid
11b2(mdo sde): sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub po zhes smra so// sring mo de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang nang ngam/ phyi rol
11b3(mdo sde): lam gnyi ga med par ram/ rnam par shes pa 'di sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ leb rgan nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas/ 
11b4(mdo sde): pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par nus sa/ dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngo / 
11b5(mdo sde): phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga med par ram/ byang chub de sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ leb rgan nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yul
11b6(mdo sde): na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par mi nus te/ sring mo de'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid// byang chub mnyam pa nyid
11b7(mdo sde): kyis rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smra so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yod pa
11b8(mdo sde): ma yin pa/ phyin ci log gas las skyes shing / yod pa ma yin pa phyin ci log gis tha snyad btags pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yod pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log gis
12a1(mdo sde): tha snyad btags pa ste/ sring mo de'i phyir/ sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid kyis/ phung po mnyam pa nyid// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis/ sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid// sgyu ma mnyam panyi
12a2(mdo sde): kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis/ sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid/ sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smra so// sring mo gzhan yang phung
12a3(mdo sde): po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o// spring mo byang chub kyang rmi lam gyi rang bzhin yin pas/ shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/ sring mo de'i phyir/ rmi lam mnya
12a4(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis/ phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam/ ba nyid kyis/ rmi lam mnyam pa nyid// rmi lam mnyamapa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam
12a5(mdo sde): ba nyid kyis/ rmi lam mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyi/ ra/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chubo zhes smra so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ 
12a6(mdo sde): 'khrul pa'i las kyis bskyed pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang smig rgyu'i rang bzhin te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa'o// sring mo de'i phyir/ smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis/ phung po mnya
12a7(mdo sde): pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis/ smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid do// smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis/ smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid de/ srid
12a8(mdo sde): mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smra so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ 'pho ba med pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang / gzugs
12b1(mdo sde): brnyan gyi rang bzhin te/ 'pho ba med pa'o// sring mo de'i phyir/ gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid kyis/ phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis/ gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid// 
12b2(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis/ gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang
12b3(mdo sde): chub po zhes smraso// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni ming tsam ste/ ming de yang g.yo ba med pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang ming tsam ste/ ming de yang g.yo ba med pa'o// g.yo ba med pa mnyam
12b4(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam// pa nyid kyis/ g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid do// g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// 
12b5(mdo sde): byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyi nga byang chub bo zhes smra so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnam
12b6(mdo sde): la byed pa po med de/ ma byas pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la ngo bo nyid med de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la 'byung ba med de/ ma byung ba'i don ni
12b7(mdo sde): byang chub bo// phung po rnams la rtag pa nyid med de/ mi rtag pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la bde ba nyid med de/ sdug bsngal ba'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la
12b8(mdo sde): sdug pa med de/ mi sdug pa'i don ni byang chub po// phung po rnams la bdag med de bdag med pa'i don ni byang chubo// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams la mngon par grub pa med de/ mngon par
13a1(mdo sde): grub pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams ni dben pa ste/ dben pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la gzung ba med de/ gzung ba med pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po nas
13a2(mdo sde): la gzhi med de/ gzhi med pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med de/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams ni da ltar byung ba la mi gnas pa/ 
13a3(mdo sde): ste da ltar byung ba la mi gnas pa'i don ni byang chub bo// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams ni/ 'phags pa rnams kyi tha snyad yin pas/ byang chub kyang 'phags pa rnams kyi tha snyad do// phung po
13a4(mdo sde): rnams ni tha snyad med pa'i rang bzhin te/ byang chub kyang tha snya dad med pa'o// phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de zhin gshegs pas thugasu chud pa'i chos thams cad kyi
13a5(mdo sde): rang bzhin te/ de ni byang chub ces bya'o// sring mo de ltar na chu nga po lnga'i rang bzhin ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin no// byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/ 
13a6(mdo sde): sring po phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod
13a7(mdo sde): nyid byang chub po zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin te/ phung po ma gtogs par yang / rtogs pa yang med la/ byang chub ma gtog
13a8(mdo sde): par yang rtogs pa med pas de ltar rtogs pa gang yin pa de byang chub ces bya ste/ sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smra so// sring mo rnams grangs 'dis/ 
13b1(mdo sde): na 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ ji lta sems can thams cad byang chub tu gtogs pa ltar/ de gtogs pa med par bstan pa ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du
13b2(mdo sde): khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyis lus 'di la/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / khams bzhi po de
13b3(mdo sde): ngag mngon par grub pa de la/ sring mo sa'i khams ni bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yino// byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems
13b4(mdo sde): can ma yin/ srog ma yin skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / mo'i khams/ dang / rlung gi khams kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can
13b5(mdo sde): ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yi no// byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yi na/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ 
13b6(mdo sde): no shin tu na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ sa'i khams dang / byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu med pa'i phyir chu'i khams dang / byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu mi g.yo ba'i
13b7(mdo sde): phyir me'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu bstan tu med pa'i phyir/ rlung gi khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// sring mo sa'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin
13b8(mdo sde): gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thug su chud do// sring mo chu'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs/ 
14a1(mdo sde): su chud do// snying mo mo'i khams gang yin pa'i khams don/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thug su chud do// sring mo chu
14a2(mdo sde): khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugasu chud do// sring mo sa'i khams gtogs pa ni byang chub bo// sring mo de bzhin
14a3(mdo sde): du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rtogs pa ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smra so// sring mo sa'i khams kyis
14a4(mdo sde): chu'i khams yang dag par mi she so// chu'i khams kyis me de'i khams yang dag par mi she so// me'i khams kyis rlung gi khams yang dag par mi she so// sring mo de ltar na
14a5(mdo sde): khams kyi ming yong su shes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub ces bya ste/ sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smra so// sring mo gzhan yang
14a6(mdo sde): gang khyod kyi lus 'di la mi mngon par grub pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mngon par grub pa de la/ sring mo mig ni stong pa ste/ mig stong pa nyid kyi rang
14a7(mdo sde): bzhin ni byang chub bo// rna ba ni stong pa ste/ rna ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// sna ni stong pa ste/ sna stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// lce ni stong pa ste/ lce stong pa nyid kyi rang
14a8(mdo sde): bzhin ni byang chub bo// lus ni stong pa ste/ lus stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// yid ni stong pa ste/ yid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di
14b1(mdo sde): skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smra so// sring mo gzhan yang mig stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugasu 'dogs par mi byed de/ gzugs stong pa'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub bo// ga
14b2(mdo sde): dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos su 'dogs par mi byed de/ chos stong pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du
14b3(mdo sde): khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smra so// sring mo mig ni gzugs mi len te/ byang chub kyang gzugs mi len to// rna ba ni sgra mi len te/ byang chub kyang sgra mi len to// sna ni dri mi len te/ byang chub
14b4(mdo sde): kyang dri mi len to// lce ni ro ma len te/ byang chub kyang ro mi le na to// lus ni reg bya mi len te/ byang chub kyang reg bya mi len to// yid ni chos mi len te/ byang chub kyang
14b5(mdo sde): chos mi len to// sring mo de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gzugs dang bral ba ni/ byang chub bo// yid chos dang bral ba 'i bar du yang / byang chub yin pa'i phyiraro// sring mo de ltar
14b6(mdo sde): na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi khams dang / mtshams sbyor ba med de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams su bral ba ni byang / 
14b7(mdo sde): chub bo// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / sgra'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sgra'i kham su bral ba ni byang chub po// sna'i
14b8(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ dri'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / dri'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo// lce'i rnam par
15a1(mdo sde): shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ ro'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / ro'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo// lus kyi
15a2(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ reg bya'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / reg pa'i khamasu bral ba ni byang chub bo// yid kyi
15a3(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi kham su bral ba ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i
15a4(mdo sde): phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes/ smras so// sring mo de ltar na byang chub dang / mig gi rna/ ma par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyi su med de/ gnyis su
15a5(mdo sde): dbyer med do// byang chub dang / gzugs kyi khams de ni ge nyis su med de gnyi su dbyer med do// byang chub dang / mi ga gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyi su med de gnyi su
15a6(mdo sde): dbyer med do// byang chub dang / yid kyi khams kyi bar du de ni gnyi su med de gnyisu dbyer med do// byang chub dang chos kyi khams de ni/ gnyi su med de gnyi su dbyer med do// byang chub dang yid
15a7(mdo sde): kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyi su med de/ gnyi su dbyer med do// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub po zhes smra so// sring mo gzhan yang mig mi rtogs pa ni/ 
15a8(mdo sde): byang chub bo// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// mig gi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo// de bzhin du rna ba dang
15b1(mdo sde): sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo// sring mo mig gi rang bzhin ni ma chags mi sdang ma rmongs pa ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 
15b2(mdo sde): gti mug dang / bral ba ni byang chub bo// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin ni ma chags mi sdang ma rmongs pa ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / bral
15b3(mdo sde): ba ni byang chub bo// sring mo mig ni bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongasu 'dzin pa med pa ste/ byang chub kyang bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongasu 'dzin pa med pa'o// de bzhin du rna
15b4(mdo sde): pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/ byang chub kyang bdag po med pa// sring mo mig ni
15b5(mdo sde): skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yangam yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang
15b6(mdo sde): mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang skyes pa'i chos
15b7(mdo sde): dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin// 
15b8(mdo sde): bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo de bzhin du mig ni skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa ma yin/ khung
16a1(mdo sde): med kyang ma yin no// sring mo yid kyi bar du yang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa ma yin/ bud med kyang / 
16a2(mdo sde): ma yin no// sring mo de ltar mig gi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du yang de bzhin
16a3(mdo sde): gshegs pas thugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan
16a4(mdo sde): yang khyod kyi lus 'di ni bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang za dag ma yin/ shed las skyes pa ma yin/ shed bu ma
16a5(mdo sde): yin/  byed pa po ma yin/ tshor ba po ma yin/ shes pa po ma yin/ mthong ba po ma yin/ nyan pa po ma yin/ sdom pa po ma yin/ za ba po ma yin/ reg pa
16a6(mdo sde): po ma yin/ rnam par shes pa po ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ gso ba ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ bdag
16a7(mdo sde): gi ma yin/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin/ byas pa ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ gzugs ma yin/ sgra ma yin/ dri ma yin/ ro ma yin/ reg bya rnam par rig pa ma
16a8(mdo sde): yin te/ sring mo de lta bas na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub ces bya'o// sring mo gang yang khyod kyi lus ni g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rtag pa med pa ste/ rtswa dang / 
16b1(mdo sde): shing dang / shing ljon pa dang / rtsig pa'i tshogs rnams dang / khyad par med cing / tha dad du dbyer med do// sring mo gang yang nang gi sa'i khams dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i
16b2(mdo sde): khams gnyi su med cing / gnyis su dbyer med cing / gnyi su dbyer med de/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig par/ de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang
16b3(mdo sde): ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par thugasu chud de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang sems dang yid dang / 
16b4(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa gang gis sem/ sa pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i sems dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa de ni/ skra la gan
16b5(mdo sde): pa ma yin/ spu la gnas pa ma yin/ sha mdog la gnas pa ma yin/ lpags pa la gnas pa ma yin// / sha la gnas pa ma yin/ khrag la gnas pa ma yin// 
16b6(mdo sde): rus pa la gnas pa ma yin/ chu ba la gnas pa ma yin/ rkang la gnas pa ma yin/ nang la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi rol la gnas pa ma yin/ gnyi ga med pa la gnas pa ma
16b7(mdo sde): yin mig la gnas pa ma yin/ rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/ sna la gnas pa ma yin/ lce la gnas pa ma yin/ lus la gnas pa ma yin/ yid la gnas pa ma yin te/ gnas pa
16b8(mdo sde): ma yin/ mi gnas pa ma yin/ rgyun chad pa ma yin/ yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gzungs
17a1(mdo sde): pa med pa/ 'dre ba med pa/ gzhi med pa/ dag pa/ tsang ba 'od gsal ba te/ sems dang yid kyi rnam par rig pa de ni/ kun nus nyon mongs pa med pa/ rnam par byang
17a2(mdo sde): ba med pa ste/ de ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing / 'od gsal la/ lus med pa'i phyir/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing / rnam par dag pa med do// sring mo de ltar na phung po dang / 
17a3(mdo sde): khams dang / skye mched kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// byang chub kyi rang bzhin yang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams so// sring mo khyod kyi lus 'di la phung po dang / khas/ 
17a4(mdo sde): dang skye mched gang dag mngon par grub pa de dag ni/ byang chub ste/ byang chub gzhan ma yin no// de ci'i phyi dar zhe na/ byang chub ni phung po dang / khams dang skye mched
17a5(mdo sde): rnams las gzhan ma yin te/ de dag nyid byang chub yi na bas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ni/ byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod
17a6(mdo sde): la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ na mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu lnga 'bum gyis/ bla na med
17a7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// gang dag smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang // 
17a8(mdo sde): bu mo rnams las srog chags nyis brgyas kyang // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lha dang mi drug cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med
17b1(mdo sde): cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal yang tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ yan
17b2(mdo sde): lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas/ tshangs par
17b3(mdo sde): spyad pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'di skad ces
17b4(mdo sde): smras so// 'jam dpal bdag kyang / khyod kyi tshe das su bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad la ste rang brtse ba dang / snying rjes sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi gcad
17b5(mdo sde): pa dang / chos kyi gdung mi gcad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung mi gcad pa'i slad du/ khyod kyis bstan pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
17b6(mdo sde): sems bskyed par bgyi'o// de bzhin du chos rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems can thams cad la chos bstan par yang bgyi'o// nyes par bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib
17b7(mdo sde): pa yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du/ nongs pa la nongs par bshags par bgyi'o// gang na chos thams cad zhi zhing nye bar zhi bar ma rtogs nas/ tshul bzhin ma lags
17b8(mdo sde): pa yid la bgyid pa'i sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyin ci log gi dbang du mchis pa dang / rang gi lus la mngon par zhen pas/ 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i
18a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyis ni/ chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ma rdzogs so// 'jam dpal de lta lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang gang dag 'dod chags kyi
18a2(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag kyang / chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ji 'dra ba de nyid dang ldan no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ldan pa'i chos 'di la slob
18a3(mdo sde): cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ ji ltar mchis pa ma lags
18a4(mdo sde): pa lang kun brtags pa las 'byung bar de ltar kun brtags pa yongs su rtogs na/ 'gag par 'gyur bas gsog dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o// 'jam
18a5(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gi sa 'tshal ba ltar na/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni rang bzhin ma mchis shing byung ba ma mchis pas sprin
18a6(mdo sde): gyi tshogs dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni skad cig la 'jigs cing 'ju ste/ chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni shin tu mngon par grub pa/ ma mchis
18a7(mdo sde): pa ste/ rlung dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das te/ na mkha'i ri mo dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ring du mi gnas
18a8(mdo sde): pas chu'i ri mo dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i 'jug pa las 'byung ba ste/ gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang 'dra'o// 
18b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams ni ma mchis pa la phyin ci log tu mthong ba las 'byung ba ste/ sprin mar dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni kun brtags pa las byung ba ste/ yang dag pa ma
18b2(mdo sde): lags pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ngar 'dzin pas lhag par chags pa dang 'brel pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag gir 'dzin pas/ dngos por yongs su 'dzin
18b3(mdo sde): pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni log pas bskyed pas glo bur du byung ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam par rtog pa las byung bas/ mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba dang
18b4(mdo sde): 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams sna tshog/ sa la mi dpyod pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ste/ so sor mi rtog pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems
18b5(mdo sde): dang rjes su 'thun par bskyed pa ste/ nges parami sems pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ba ngag dang / gzhan la mngon par zhen pa las byung
18b6(mdo sde): ba ste/ yid ches par mi bgyi ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni phung po dag len pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams la ril por 'dzin pa'o// nyon
18b7(mdo sde): mongs pa rnams ni skye mched rnams sogs pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ming dang gzugs la rnam par 'byed pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin
18b8(mdo sde): ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa dag mi rtogs pa'o// 'jam dpal de lta lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ byang chub kyi phung bu'i gzhi lags so// 
19a1(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub kyi sa bon te/ nyon mongs pa rtogs
19a2(mdo sde): pa nyid byang chub lags so// nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub rdo rje'i gzhi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyangs dbyer ma mchis pa'i tshul
19a3(mdo sde): gyis byang chub ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi phyed pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams mthong ba ni byang chub ste/ byang chub ni yul thams cad
19a4(mdo sde): kyi rjes su spong ba'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar bya/ ngang chub rnam par gnas pa ma mchis pa de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par gnas pa ma
19a5(mdo sde): mchis pa ste/ skyes nas 'jig cing 'dzubs mi gnas pa'o// 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rna mas ni sems kyi rang bzhin lags so// de ci'i
19a6(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ 'jom dpal sems 'di ni/ chags pa 'am/ sdang ba'am/ rmongs pa zhes/ sems kyi rang bzhin bstan par mi nus te/ 'jam dpal ji ltar
19a7(mdo sde): sems bstan par mi nus pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang / yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes/ nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin bstan par mi nus
19a8(mdo sde): pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji lta ji ltar nyon mongs pa de dag rab tu rtogs pa de lta de ltar/ de 'dod chags la spyod
19b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ro// zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la ma chags/ gti mug la spyod pa rnams la ma lags te/ cha mnyam
19b2(mdo sde): ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par ba gyi ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi 'dod chags ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'dod chags la
19b3(mdo sde): spyod pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi zhe sdang ji blta ba de bzhin du/ zhe sdang la spyod pa thams cad kyi/ zhe sdang la blta
19b4(mdo sde): par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi gti dmug ji lta ba de bzhin du/ gti mug la spyod pa tha mas cad kyi/ gti mug la blta bar bgyi'o// 
19b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams ca da ji lta ba de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa thams ca de la spyod pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
19b6(mdo sde): pa la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni rtsa dang / shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes
19b7(mdo sde): rab kyi me yang nyon mongs pa'i rtsa dang / shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ mun pa mun nag
19b8(mdo sde): thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gan so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper
20a1(mdo sde): / na rlung mar ni shing ljon pa dang / ri thams cad la mi chag so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs
20a2(mdo sde): pa'i yul thams cad la mi chag so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i khams ni sreg pa'i bskal pa thams cad kyis tshig par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags
20a3(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa'i sreg pa'i bskal pa thams cad kyis tshig par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni rdul
20a4(mdo sde): dang na bun dang / sprin thams cad lhan cig mi gnas so// 2rngam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spro dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad
20a5(mdo sde): dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dpe/ ra na/ na mkha' ni sa dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 2jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i
20a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ khab long ni lcags dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de
20a7(mdo sde): bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ri khor yug ni rlung
20a8(mdo sde): thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis bskyod
20b1(mdo sde): par mi nus so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba/ bya ngang pa zhes bgyi ba ni 'o ma dang chab bsres pa las/ 'o ma nyid ni 'tshal gyi cha ba ni ma lags
20b2(mdo sde): so 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / nyon mongs pa dang 'dres pa dag las shes
20b3(mdo sde): rab nyid ni len gyi nyon mongs pa ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na/ nye dur 'brel pa'i bud med rnams la/ shing gi yal
20b4(mdo sde): ga 'dud par mi bgyid do// 'jam dpal de de bzhin du/ dbang po yongs su ma smin pa'i sa mas can rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i
20b5(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes 'dud par mi bgyid do// 'jam dpal bdag ni da ltar nyon mongs pa rnams
20b6(mdo sde): kyis 'jigs pa'am/ skrag pa ci yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal bdag gis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dben par rtogs pa'i
20b7(mdo sde): slad du'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos pa ste/ 'jam dpal
20b8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ gang dgras 'jigs pa de ni dpa' bo zhes mi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa de yang / 
21a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ gang dgras bcom pa de ni dpa' bo mi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyon mongs
21a2(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis bcom pa de yang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chu 'dang ces bgyi ba chab kyi nang du stsal na gsher
21a3(mdo sde): bar yang mi 'gyur zhing / chab kyi dri mas kyang mi gos la/ chab kyi rnyog ma thams rung dang bar 'aming ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i
21a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i nang na da gnas kyang / nyon mongs pas gsher bar yang / da mi 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa'i dri mas kyang mi gos
21a5(mdo sde): la nyon mongs pa'i rnyogs ma thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyid do// de nas smad 'tsheng ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis bstan pa 'di bshad nas/ yang
21a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
21a7(mdo sde): sring mo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad med pa zhes mi bya'o// sring mo 'di lta
21a8(mdo sde): ste dper na/ 'bru mar gyi sgron ma la mun pa mun nag snang na/ de 'bru mar gyi sgron ma zhes mi bya'o// sring mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba 'am
21b1(mdo sde): 'gag par mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes mi bya'o// sring mo nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ su gang kun nas nyon mongs pa yang mi mthong / 
21b2(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba yang mi mthong ste/ mthong ba dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par rig pa dang bral ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// sring mo gang dag gang du sems dang / yid dang / 
21b3(mdo sde): rnam par rig pa 'jug na/ tha na mya ngan las 'das par sems pa yang rung ste/ de thams cad ni nyon mongs pa'o de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa med pa la ni sems sam/ sems
21b4(mdo sde): la 'jug pa med pa'i phyir te/ gang gis dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'i dmigs pa la sems 'jug pa de dag thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa'o// gang mngon
21b5(mdo sde): par 'du byed pa de ni 'khor ba'o// gang 'khor ba de ni 'du byed do// 'du byed thad ni 'khor ba ste/ sring mo de dag ni nyon mongs pa yin no// srong me nyon mongs pa zhes
21b6(mdo sde): bya ba de ni sbyor ba ste/ mig dang gzugasu sbyor ba ni/ nyon mongs pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang ro dang lus dang reg bya dang / yid dang / chos su sbyor ba ni
21b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'o// tshul khrims la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la
21b8(mdo sde): sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// rab tu dben pa la sbyor bar sems pa ni nyon mongs pa'o// sring me nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni/ rgyu ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dag so// de ni smras
22a1(mdo sde): pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dag so// de ni rtsol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dag so// de ni 'byung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas te/ sring mo grangs dang / grangs med pa
22a2(mdo sde): dang bral ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa nyid do// sring mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag la yang nyen mongs pa med la/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las kyang rab tu thar par bya ba la
22a3(mdo sde): yang shin tu brtsol ba de ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las rab tu thar par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson
22a4(mdo sde): 'grus yang dag phul lo// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul gang lags// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ stong pa nyid la
22a5(mdo sde): so sor rtog pa'i rje su 'jug cing / lta ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / mtshan ma med pa las somartog pa'i rje su 'jug cing / mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems
22a6(mdo sde): can rnams la snying rje ba dang / smon pa med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjesu 'jug cing / smon pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la so sor rtog pa'i
22a7(mdo sde): rjesu 'jug cing / mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / skye ba med cing 'chi 'pho med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rje su 'jug cing / rga ba dang / shi bar 'du shes pa'i
22a8(mdo sde): sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / skye ba med pa la so sor rtog pa'i rje su 'jug cing / skye ba dang / 'jig par 'du shes pa'i sen rnams la snying rje ba dang / nyan thos nges pa la so sor
22b1(mdo sde): rtog pa'i rjesu 'jug cing / nyan thos kyi 'bras bu thob pa las bzlog pa dang rang sangs rgyasu nges pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjesu 'jug cing / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras
22b2(mdo sde): bu thob pa las ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa so sor rtog pa'i rjesu 'jug cing / sems can thams cad la yang snying rje ba ste/ sring mo
22b3(mdo sde): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phulo// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa ni swa'i/ rin po che chen po dag thogs ste ldog par
22b4(mdo sde): ni dka'o// sring mo de bzhin du stong pa nyid la so sor/ brtag par ni sla'i/ thabs la mkhas pa dang brag dpas ldog par ni dka'o// mtshan ma med pa dang / smen
22b5(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa
22b6(mdo sde): la yang so sor brtag par ni sla'o/ thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka'o// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ g.yul ngo chen por 'jug pa ni sla'i/ ma smas ma nyams
22b7(mdo sde): par rgyal ba ni dka'o// sring mo de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du 'jug par sla'i// thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka'o// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpa
22b8(mdo sde): thabs shes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo thabs shes bya ba ni/ gang phyogs gnyis mi spong ba ste/ 'di ltar 'khor ba'i phyogs dang / mya ngan las
23a1(mdo sde): 'das pa'i phyogs so// sring mo thabs shes bya ba/ gang sgo gnyis ston par byed pa ste/ 'khor ba'i sgo dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo dang / stong pa nyid kyi sgra
23a2(mdo sde): dang / lta ba las rab tu thar pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma las rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / smon pa med pa'i sgo dang / bsams bzhin du skye ba'i sgo dang / mngon
23a3(mdo sde): bar 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo dang / dge ba mngon du 'du bya ba'i sgo dang / skye ba med pa'i sgo dang / skye ba kun tu ston pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgo dang / phung po dang / khams
23a4(mdo sde): dang / skye mched kyi sgo dang / skye ba med cing / 'gag pa med/ pa'i sgra dang / skye ba dang / 'byung ba'i sgo dang / bden/ dpa'i sgo dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
23a5(mdo sde): sgo dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo dang / chos thams cad/ so sor srung ba'i sgo dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i
23a6(mdo sde): sgo dang / rang byang chub kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mi brjed pa'i sgo ste/ sring mo byang chub sems dpa' gang sgo gnyis nye bar ston kyang sgo thams cad la yang chags pa med pa
23a7(mdo sde): de ni thabs mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi sgo dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo dang / zhe sdang gi sgo dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sgo dang / gti mug gi sgo dang / 
23a8(mdo sde): gti mug dang bral ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgo dang / 'gro ba med pa'i sgo ste/ sring mo 'di ni byang chub sems/ 
23b1(mdo sde): dpa'i thal la mkhas pa'o// byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo
23b2(mdo sde): gang yin pa/ de gnyi ga shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// // bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma// yang de'i tshe na/ bcom ldan 'das brgod
23b3(mdo sde): kyi phung po'i ngos kyi sman ldong zhig na/ zha 'bring byed pa'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang gcig tu ring du 'chags pas/ 'chag cing bzhugs so// der bzhugs nas/ 
23b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul dang / thabs la mkhas pa ji skad
23b5(mdo sde): bstan pa de ni de bzhin te/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin pa dang / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra desastong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
23b6(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis go bar gyur cing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra de nyid kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par yang gyur nas/ lha dang / klu dang gnod
23b7(mdo sde): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto ba phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba mang po dag
23b8(mdo sde): leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra des bskul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
24a1(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi
24a2(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis/ bcom ldan la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes bdagyi ba'i sgra gang gis stong
24a3(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis su la skul/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de ni 'jam
24a4(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'o// lha'i bu rnams kyi gsol/ dpa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur degyur pa de da lta ga na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
24a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag 'jam dpal gzhon nuragyur pa ni/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i shar phyogs kyi sgo na/ smad 'tsheng ma'i bu mo gser mtsho
24a6(mdo sde): 'od dpal zhes bya ba dang / lhan cig tu chos dang ldan pa'i gtam zer zhing 'dug gis/ lha'i bu dag gang dag chos nyan par 'dod pa dag kyang der deng shig/ de nas lha dang / klu dang / 
24a7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong nga de dag
24a8(mdo sde): thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / lus rags par sprul nas/ me tog gi char rab tu phab ste/ me tog gi char des rgyal
24b1(mdo sde): po'i khab kyi kho ra khor yug tu/ me tog gi chal bar bkram par gyur to// de nas lha rnams kyis kyang mi rnams mthong zhing / mi rnams kyis kyang lha rnams mthong ste/ phan tshun smra ba mi
24b2(mdo sde): byed do// de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dag/ me tog de dag gis kyang bskul/ lha'i lus rags pa de dag gis kyang bskul
24b3(mdo sde): nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong ngo // rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ dpung gi tshig yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig rgyal po'i
24b4(mdo sde): 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song nas/ 'khor de dang / rgyal po ma skyes rapa dang / blon po dang / 
24b5(mdo sde): blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag gi khu rnams kyis/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de/ 'dod chags kyi nyen mongs par
24b6(mdo sde): gan nas ldang ba dang bral te/ dang po dang spyod lam rab tu zhi zhing / dbang po mi g.yeng la/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / dpal gyos legs par 'am yang nas kyang de la byin changs
24b7(mdo sde): yang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtag pa myi skye bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ skye ba'i tshigs chen pa de 'dus par rig nas/ smad 'tshong sa'i bu mogs pabachog 'ad rdzam
24b8(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// bu ma skye bo'i tshigs thams cad kyis khyod mthong yang / byor shing chags pa med na/ khyod kyis nyon mongs pa de dag gang drabags/ bumos smras pa 'a ma dpal sems/ 
25a1(mdo sde): / can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ ye shes dang rnam par grol ba la gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa ste/ de dag kyang ma bskyed pa dang / ma bka
25a2(mdo sde): pa dang / ma bsgyur bar de ltar bdag gis rtogs so// nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang lags pa de yang bdag gis rtogs lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu me nyon mongs
25a3(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin de gang yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal rtog pa ma mchis shing / rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni/ nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so// tshul
25a4(mdo sde): bzhin ma lags pa ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni nyon mongs dpa'i rang bzhin lags so// nyon mongs pa rnams ni blo bur te/ stong pa nyid rtogs pa dang lhan cig mi
25a5(mdo sde): gnas so// mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ishes pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so// rang bzhinagyis 'od gsal ba dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam
25a6(mdo sde): dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ dug drag pa'i sbrul gdug pas bltas pa tsam gyis/ skye bo 'gum par 'gyur ba las/ de mi zhig gis dug thams cad 'jil ba dang / dug thams cad rab tu zhi
25a7(mdo sde): bar bgyid pa'i sman gnod sel ces bgyi ba 'tshal te mchis nas/ de nas sman de bstan ma thag tu sprul gdug pa'i dug de ma mchis par bgyis nas/ de la khye'u dang bu mo rnams brtse bas rtse zhing khye'u
25a8(mdo sde): dang bu mo de dag sbrul gdug pa de dang lhan cig du rtse bar bgyid de/ pang par len cing glo la se ral 'phreng du btags ste/ rten du bgyis kyang tshig par mi bgyid/ za bar mi bgyid/ sdug bsngal/ 
25b1(mdo sde): du mi bgyid do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du bdag kyang sngon chos 'dul ba ma thos pa na/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa phyin ci log la nye ba gnas pa'i nyon mongs pas yongs su/ 
25b2(mdo sde): bsregs pa na/ 'dod chags kyis rang gi lus la chags shing / rang gi gzugs la mngon par zhen te/ gzugs dbu ba lta bur so sor rtog par mi bgyid/ lus sgyu ma'i chos nyid
25b3(mdo sde): du 'tshal/ dga' ba'i rtsed mo rmi lam lta bur ma 'tshal/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i ro myang ba sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa lta bur ma 'tshal/ srog gi dbang po zil pa'i thigs pa lte bur ma 'tshal
25b4(mdo sde): 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par ma 'tshal/ lus mi sdug par ma 'tshal/ 'du byed thams cad shin tu sdug bsngal bar ma 'tshal cing chos thams cad bdag
25b5(mdo sde): ma mchis par so sor rtog par mi bgyid de/ bdag kyang mun pa mun nag gis bsgribs shing / gzhan la yang mun par bgyid// bdag kyang bcings shing / gzhan la yang
25b6(mdo sde): bcing bar bgyid pa las/ 'jam dpal gang gi tshe/ bdag gis khyod las chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchis thos te/ thos nas kyang mos shing / mos nas kyang rnam par grol te/ 
25b7(mdo sde): de'i slad du bdag da ltar dang / slang chad chags pa'i mig gis/ su la yang blta bar mi bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal snang ba ni mun pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 
25b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba ni su yang nyon mongs pa rnams la chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ smad 'tshong
26a1(mdo sde): / ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis/ 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma 'jam dpal lha'i 'khor dang / mi'i 'khor chen po 'di 'dus kyis/ gang gis lnga
26a2(mdo sde): dang mi 'di dag gis nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de dag rtogs nas/ sems can rnams la snying rje bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur/ 
26a3(mdo sde): bde lta bu'i chos kyi bka' mchid bgyid par khyod spobs pa mdzod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin la ni mos par dka'o// de ci'i phyir/ 
26a4(mdo sde): zhe na/ sring mo nyon mongs pa'i rang zhin ni/ byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na dme ma sbar ba ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid ma yin no// sring
26a5(mdo sde): mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yongs su ma rtags na/ 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ma yin no// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me sbar ba ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid
26a6(mdo sde): yin no// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yongs su brtags na/ 'khor ba'i bdag nyid yin no// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na me ni rgyu yod na 'bar ro// sring mo de bzhin
26a7(mdo sde): du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgyu yod na/ khams gsum du 'ang ro// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me na rgyu med na mi 'ba'o// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs
26a8(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgyu med na/ khams gsum du mi 'bar ro// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ lo stong du 'bar ba'i me la ni skye ba dang 'bri ba med do// sri
26b1(mdo sde): me de bzhin du bskal pa brgya stong du/ rgyu ba'i nyon mongs pa la yang / skye ba dang 'bri ba med do// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me shi ba la ni me zhes mi gdags so// sring me
26b2(mdo sde): bzhin du nyon mongs par shes pa zhi ba la yang / nyon mongs pa zhes mi gdag so// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' gang la me 'bar yang / na mkha' ni me des tshig par
26b3(mdo sde): mi nus// sring mo de bzhin du gang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la/ blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa byang yang / rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba de ni/ blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa des/ kun
26b4(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs par byed mi nus so// sring mo 'di ltar yang gzugs kyi lus la ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mtsho bran gyi chab kyi
26b5(mdo sde): nang gi chu zla bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo phung po rnams ji ltar lta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
26b6(mdo sde): sprul pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khams rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ khams gsum bskal pa'i mes bsreg par gyur pa bzhin du'o// 
26b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo skye mched drug rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ 'khor 'di ni steng gin mkha'i mtshams bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
26b8(mdo sde): bu me khyod nyid ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ 'khor 'di ni steng gi nam pa'i mtshams bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mos khyod nyid ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos spras pa/ 
27a1(mdo sde): // 'jam dpal dper na/ bdag pa dang ma gnyis phrad pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ long ba gzug/ 
27a2(mdo sde): la ji lta ba bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis 'di dag thos sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ sgyu ma sprul pa'i rna ba'i rnam par rig pa lta bus
27a3(mdo sde): thos lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag nyid byang chub lags te/ yang
27a4(mdo sde): 'dod par mi bgyid do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad dam/ bu mo des smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad
27a5(mdo sde): gtan du yongs su btang bas spyad lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa yongs su rdzogs par byas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam
27a6(mdo sde): dpal na mkha' yongs su rdzogs pas/ yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lpags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam
27a7(mdo sde): dpal sems can thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pas bsgoms lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtsams sam// 
27a8(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad thob par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ brtsams lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
27b1(mdo sde): sam khu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad kyi dbyings gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ bdag gnas lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu me khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
27b2(mdo sde): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag chad ma mchis par yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyed kyis
27b3(mdo sde): byams pa bsgoms sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad ni mi srid pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i
27b4(mdo sde): snying rje chen po gang nas btsal bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las 'tshal ba 'o// de
27b5(mdo sde): ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mong/ sa pa ma mchis par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa'/ yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
27b6(mdo sde): skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba gang las rtsal bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi
27b7(mdo sde): sems lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu me byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms/ ci zhig byed// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ni/ sems
27b8(mdo sde): can thams cad mi slu ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / chos thams cad la 'gal ba ma mchis par nye bar mchi bar bgyid pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'gal ba zhes
28a1(mdo sde): bgyi ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang dag ma mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba'i slad du byang chub la rab tu zhugs pa dag go// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
28a2(mdo sde): de dag gang dang 'gal/ bu mos smras pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang ngo // 'dzam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo phas kyi rgol ba dag gang yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang dag
28a3(mdo sde): bzod pa'i rlom sems kyis gzhan la rgol ba dag lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo bzod pa zhes bya ba ga las 'ong / bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad
28a4(mdo sde): kyis tho ba tsam pa las mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ tho btsam da ma mchis na/ bzod pa ci yang ma mchis pa'i slad du da ste/ 'jam dpal gang la sems can gang gis tho btsam
28a5(mdo sde): pa na 'khrug pa ma mchis shing / gnod pa mi bgyid pa de/ bzod pa bsgom pa lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khong khro ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos
28a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis bskal pa brgyar brtsegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la gnod par bgyid pa de ni khong khro ba zhes bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo bzod pa zhes
28a7(mdo sde): bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gi sems la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis shing / yul thams cad la gnod pa mi bya ba ste/ de ni bzod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o// 
28a8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu me ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang chos thams cad la rnam par 'byed kyang mi
28b1(mdo sde): dmigs pa lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang bdud thams cad 'dul bar bgyid/ 
28b2(mdo sde): kyang / nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni phung po rnams kyang ston kyang / phung po'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas
28b3(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa rnams ston kyang / rang bzhin chos nyid kyis chags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 
28b4(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rga ba dang / 'tsho ba ston kyang / chos thams cad la 'chi 'pho dang / 'gro ba ma mchis par rab tu rtogs pa dang / 'jam
28b5(mdo sde): dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni lha'i bu dag ston kyang / phrag dog dang / rlom sems thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang
28b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas shes rab dang / thabs yongs su sgom pas/ sems
28b7(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bgyid do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpas ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal
28b8(mdo sde): rang gi sems dang shes pa yongs su sgom pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'khor 'di ni
29a1(mdo sde): / khyod la chos nyan par 'dod// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang du bdag dang / gzhan du 'du shes 'jug pa de ni/ nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags la/ 
29a2(mdo sde): glang la rna ba'i rnam par rig pas/ rnam par shes pa 'jug na yang / nyan par mtshal ba ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo chos nyan par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu
29a3(mdo sde): yin khu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gi tshe rang gi lus la rmi lam gyi mi lta bur mos pa dang / ston pa'i chos de la yang brag cha'i sgra skad lta bur mos shing mos pa dang / rnam par grol ba
29a4(mdo sde): yang gnyis su mi bgyid pa de tsam gyis na/ chos nyan dpar 'tshal ba lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu me chos ji ltar mnyan par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ chos la
29a5(mdo sde): ston pa nan tan bgyid pas/ chos mnyan par bgyi'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i shes rab kyis
29a6(mdo sde): smad 'tsheng ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis de lta de ltar chos bstan pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
29a7(mdo sde): bskyed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i lha dang mi lnga brgya ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags sum khri nyis stong / 
29a8(mdo sde): ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go bu mo de yang chos nyan pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas/ chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod
29b1(mdo sde): pa thob par gyur to// de nas bzod pa thob nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la gtugs te/ 'jam dpal thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag rab tu 'byung du gsol// tshul bzhin/ 
29b2(mdo sde): ma lags pa kun bskyed pa/ 'phags pa ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i chos las nyams par bgyid pa'i lus 'di lus 'di las thar par mdzad du gsol zhes rab tu dbyung bar gsol
29b3(mdo sde): ba btab bo// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo 'di lta ste/ mgo'i skra 'dreg pa de de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bu mo gang sems can
29b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gcad pa'i phyir brtson pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir ro//  bu mo gang gos ngur smrig 'chang ba de ni/ byang chub sems
29b5(mdo sde): dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ bu mo gang bdag nyid/ kyang bslab pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs la/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can rnams
29b6(mdo sde): kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang / brtul zhugs la yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bu mo gang bdag nyid dben par gnas pa de ni// 
29b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ bu mo gang 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na rnam par rgyug pa'i sems can rnams dben par shes pa la 'god par byed pa de/ byang chub sems
29b8(mdo sde): dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o// kha dog dang / gzugs kyi rtags dang / spyod lam gyi dbyings ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gzhan dang / gang
30a1(mdo sde): / ngag gzhan dag la byams pa dang / snying rje ba'i sems bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
30a2(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lhag pa'i
30a3(mdo sde): bsam pa la gus pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gzhan yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gus pa ni/ byang chub sems
30a4(mdo sde): dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag gi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa ni
